name.ja: ファミリーコンピュータゲーム

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: “Family Computer Games” is an FC game simulator that can run in a browser and has FC games built-in.
short.ko: “Family Computer Games”는 브라우저에서 실행할 수 있는 FC 게임 시뮬레이터이며 많은 수의 FC 게임이 내장되어 있습니다.자체 게임을 플레이하거나 드래그 앤 드롭 방식으로 업로드하여 자신의 컴퓨터에서 FC 게임을…
short.ru: Family Computer Games - это игровой симулятор FC, который может работать в браузере и имеет множество встроенных игр FC.  Вы можете…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Family Computer Games" is an FC game simulator that can run in a browser and has a large number of FC games built-in. You can play the built-in games, or upload and play FC games on your own computer through drag and drop, supporting two player games! Through this plugin, you can take your FC games home and play them anytime, anywhere in the browser!
